title: Bobby Addresses Girlfriend 'PR Stunt' Accusation + Raymundo Won't Be Allowing Kids At Their Wedding + Bobby’s Mailbag: Kids Drinking Coffee
itunes:title: Bobby Addresses Girlfriend 'PR Stunt' Accusation + Raymundo Won't Be Allowing Kids At Their Wedding + Bobby’s Mailbag: Kids Drinking Coffee
description:
Bobby clears the air after a listener reached out to Amy via Instagram DM (direct message) inquiring about Bobby’s new girlfriend being a publicity stunt and not a real relationship.  Raymundo explains why they aren't allowing kids at their October wedding. Plus, Bobby opens up the mailbag and asks if it’s okay for children to drink coffee. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
